name: 2D Puzzle Platformer
description:
Use the power of the Rainbow Gauntlet to steal colors and manipulate objects to solve puzzles and unlock secret gateways in this puzzle platformer.

Controls:

Space - Jump
A/D - Move Left/Right
S - Fall down through two-way platforms
Left Mouse Click - Swap colors with an object of a different color
Left Mouse Drag - Manipulate an object of the same color

You can press the Enter key to skip to the next level if you are having difficulties with a level, but remember all levels are possible.
